column4: is creating a separate partition for /home a good idea? Or is there an easy to backup /home in case I hose something?

The base install is about 2G, so thats the absolute minimum for /.  I think 10G is a good size, 20G would be plenty.  You're right, all of the users stuff goes in /home, so for most people, / is reasonably small, with /home having most of the stuff
you download as a torrent, instead of from the mirrors (which are especially slow right now)
